PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MarineVehicleDesignCriteria
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of design criteria of all occurrences of _IfcTransportElement_ and types of _IfcTransportElementType_ with the predefined type set to MARINEVEHICLE

PropertyDef.Name: AllowableHullPressure
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable contact pressure between fender and hull

PropertyDef.Name: SoftnessCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: Vessel flexibility factor - proportion of impact energy absorbed by the hull.
